content: type of instructions free pattern - written pattern is written line by line paid pattern - one page chart is best viewed on a device where you can zoom into it - written pattern is written line by line - 4 page chart is enlarged so you can print the pages out and place them together for a larger scale view of the chart - color block pattern is color and number blocks written line by line skill level - you must know how to crochet & what stitches to use - you must know how to c2c - you must know how to read a c2c graph - you must know how to read c2c written instructions - you must know how to change color - best for intermediate crocheters finished size - 48 x 60 inches approx - without border a video link for a border is included yarn & hook - stylecraft special aran or any aran/worsted yarn - h/5mm crochet hook - yards included in the pattern languages - english only please note - the pictures featured are digital samples not actual photos - colors will vary from screen to screen and when printing terms of use - for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy - all digital sales are final about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet blanket patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free version of my free pattern which can be found here https //trulycrochet com/ featuring ads
